Name: Mañana Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Salmon pink in colour, the Mañana has a subtle and delicate rum laced apricot flavour.
History: Mañana, literally meaning 'tomorrow' in Spanish but more usually used to mean some indefinite time in the future. This recipe is adapted from David A. Embury's 1948 The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Mañana Daiquiri contains 181 calories
